author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND MOVING NORTHWESTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR LAS ISLAS MARIAS...
summary: ...RAYMOND MOVING NORTHWESTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR LAS ISLAS MARIAS... As of 12:00 PM CST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 18.7, -105.6 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...RAYMOND MOVING NORTHWESTWARD... ...TROPICAL STORM WARNING ISSUED FOR LAS ISLAS MARIAS... As of 12:00 PM CST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 18.7, -105.6 with movement NW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 998 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
